mapper.select: SELECT RESUME.resume_no resumeNo, RESUME.resume_title resumeTitle, RESUME.member_id memberId, RESUME.resume_working_form resumeWorkingForm, RESUME.resume_salary resumeSalary, RESUME.resume_wish_area resumeWishArea, RESUME.resume_wish_job resumeWishJob, RESUME.resume_wish_industry resumeWishIndustry, RESUME.resume_avaliability resumeAvaliability, RESUME.resume_self_introduction_title resumeSelfIntroductionTitle, RESUME.resume_self_introduction_contents resumeSelfIntroductionContents, RESUME.resume_career resumeCareer, RESUME.resume_date resumeDate, member.member_name memberName, member.member_phone memberPhone, member.member_birthdate memberBirthdate, member.member_gender memberGender FROM linkjobs_resume RESUME INNER JOIN linkjobs_member AS member ON RESUME.member_id = member.member_id WHERE RESUME.resume_avaliability = '공개'
